name: Impeccably Organized
effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 570 HP every 5s for 30s.
description: Kachina's specialty. The chips are arrayed in neat rows, fried just right. In their crunchy deliciousness, you can see Kachina's earnestness and care. Would it be too much motivation for her if you were to tell her how you felt about the dish, plus some compliments?
